text: One Day We'll Talk About Today () is a 2020 Indonesian family drama movie directed by Angga Dwimas Sasongko and was based on the novel of the same name Marcella EP. It stars Rachel Amanda, Rio Dewanto, Oka Antara, Sheila Dara Aisha, Ardhito Pramono, Umay Shahab, Isyana Sarasvati. ==Other websites== * Category:2020 drama movies Category:Family movies Category:Indonesian movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Angga Dwimas Sasongko
title: One Day We'll Talk About Today
